content: पारः, --रं [परं तीरं परमेव अण्, पॄ-घञ् वा] {@--1@} The further or opposite bank of a river or ocean; पारं दुःखोदधेर्गंतुं तर यावन्न भिद्यते <ls>Śānti. 3. 1</ls>; विरहजलधेः पारमासादयिष्ये <ls>Pad. D. 13</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 204.</ls> {@--2@} The further or opposite side of anything; <ls>Ku. 2. 58.</ls> {@--3@} The end or extremity of anything; furtherest or concluding limit; <ls>Ve. 3. 25.</ls> {@--4@} The fullest extent, the totality of anything; स पूर्वजन्मांतरदृष्टपाराः स्मरन्निव <ls>R. 18. 50</ls>; (पारं गम्, --इ, --या {1} to cross over, surmount, get over; <ls>Pt. 2. 6.</ls> {@--2@} to accomplish, fulfil; as in प्रतिज्ञायाः पारंगतः. {3} to master fully, become proficient in; सकलशास्त्रपारं गतः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; पारं नी ‘to bring to a close.’). --रः Quick-silver. (पारे meaning ‘on the other side of’, ‘beyond’ sometimes enters into <ab>comp.</ab>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पारेगंगं, पारेसमद्रं beyond the Ganges or theocean).

पारः, --रं [परं तीरं परमेव अण्, पॄ-घञ् वा] {@--1@} The further or opposite bank of a river or ocean; पारं दुःखोदधेर्गंतुं तर यावन्न भिद्यते <ls>Śānti. 3. 1</ls>; विरहजलधेः पारमासादयिष्ये <ls>Pad. D. 13</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 204.</ls> {@--2@} The further or opposite side of anything; <ls>Ku. 2. 58.</ls> {@--3@} The end or extremity of anything; furtherest or concluding limit; <ls>Ve. 3. 25.</ls> {@--4@} The fullest extent, the totality of anything; स पूर्वजन्मांतरदृष्टपाराः स्मरन्निव <ls>R. 18. 50</ls>; (पारं गम्, --इ, --या {1} to cross over, surmount, get over; <ls>Pt. 2. 6.</ls> {@--2@} to accomplish, fulfil; as in प्रतिज्ञायाः पारंगतः. {3} to master fully, become proficient in; सकलशास्त्रपारं गतः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; पारं नी ‘to bring to a close.’). --रः Quick-silver. (पारे meaning ‘on the other side of’, ‘beyond’ sometimes enters into <ab>comp.</ab>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पारेगंगं, पारेसमद्रं beyond the Ganges or theocean).
